featured.text: In 1955, Anderson became the first black soloist to sing with the Metropolitan Opera of New York City.
Marian Anderson (1897-1993) was an African American woman who gained fame as a concert singer in this climate of racism.
Anderson’s beautiful voice was first recognized __________.

other.text: According to this passage, what did Marian Anderson do between 1917 and 1929?
This passage shows that Anderson finally defeated racism in the U.S. by __________.

definition.zh_def: 安德森，常見的姓氏或地名。
definition.en_def: A common surname or place name.
definition.example: Anderson is a popular surname in many English-speaking countries.
